aircraft.value: Banshee Fast - AC-2115-515 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Outflow valve control malfunction. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective De-icing System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct detailed inspection of all similar components in fleet

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 26/11/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 28/11/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 29/11/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 01/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 04/12/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta
